main event: Several witnesses observed a silvery-white disc-shaped object moving at high speed with sudden changes in direction over Wichita Falls, Texas on 9 July 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a small aircraft and appeared to descend and ascend vertically., Witnesses included military personnel with experience in observing aircraft., One witness reported the object glowing with a bluish-white light and being approximately 10-15 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted for roughly 2-3 minutes before the object disappeared., The sighting was reported to the local Air Force base, but no physical evidence was found.
witness description: military personnel and civilians with various observations
